title: Abbey Clancy puts on a VERY leggy display as she flaunts her incredible figure in a white swimsuit
text:
She welcomed her fourth child - baby boy Jack -just four months ago.

And Abbey Clancy showcased her incredible post-baby figure in a series of sizzling Instagram snaps on Sunday.

The model, 33, set pulses racing as she put on a leggy display in a white swimsuit as posed up a storm on a beach.

Sensational: Abbey Clancy showcased her incredible post-baby figure in a series of sizzling Instagram snaps on Sunday

Abbey looked amazing in the high-legged one-piece which featured a scoop neck and a lace-up design down the sides.

Accessoring her look, the star donned a designer sports cap and black sunglasses, also adding a gold watch and several bracelets.

Abbey looked fierce and confident as pulled off a number of poses, arching her feet in a bid to fully showcase her slender pins.

In another image, the mother-of-four displayed her pert derrière as she sat on a sun lounger, captioning the picture: 'Life's a peach'.

Beach babe: The model, 33, set pulses racing as she put on a leggy display in a white swimsuit as posed up a storm on a beach

The Liverpudlian beauty looked glowing as she flaunted her bronzed skin and soaked up the sun in the tropical location.

Abbey's showstopping display comes shortly after she defended her daughter Sophia's modelling debut after they collaborated for a campaign with Lipsy.

During an appearance on Lorraine earlier this month, Abbey remained defiant in the face of critics of the tender age of Sophia's modelling debut.

Abbey stated: 'I just think there’s so much bad stuff in world, any excuse have fun with my daughter! I’ve never pushed her into it., she wanted to do it! Having four kids, spreading my time is hard, so I appreciate spending time with my daughter.'

Abbey and husband Peter Crouch welcomed their fourth child Jack four months ago, and also share daughter, Liberty, four, and son Johnny, 20 months.

A bit of all white: Abbey looked amazing in the high-legged one-piece which featured a scoop neck and a lace-up design down the sides

Cheeky: In another image, the mother-of-four displayed her pert derrière as she sat on a sun lounger, captioning the picture: 'Life's a peach'

During an appearance on The Chris Moyles Show on Radio X, host Chris comically goaded Peter, 38, about Abbey and insisted that she was 'out of his league', which Peter insisted is true.

He said: 'Yeah I’ve pulled the wool over her eyes for 14 years! Like a magician! It’s a strange thing yeah, one of the wonders of the world!'

Of their first meeting, Peter said: 'Yeah I remember the occasion. We met, it was great, we got on fantastically well...

'She gave me her number – amazingly – she went away and I carried on, and I should have known then, but I was talking to someone else who was also female…

'She came over and said "Look at you! Who do you think you are?" as if we were married already. She went mental! And I was like "I’m only talking". I should have known then!'

description: The model, 33, set pulses racing as she put on a leggy display in a white swimsuit and showcased her incredible post-baby figure in a series of sizzling Instagram snaps on Sunday.
